title: shrI cAmuNDEshvari
sahitya:
shrI cAmuNDEshvari pAlayamAm krpAkari shankari 
shrtajana pAlini mahA balAtri vAsini mahiSAsuramardini


anupallavi

  vAcAma gOcara mahima virAjitE varaguN bharitE 
vAgpati mukha sura vanditE vAsudEva sahajAtE


caraNam    rAkA nishAkara sannibha vadanE rAjIva lOcanE 
ramaNiya kundaradanE rakSita bhuvanE maNicaraNE
mUka vAgpradAna vikhyAtE muni varanuta su-prItE 
shrIkara tAraka mantra tOSita cittE sadA namastE
